name: Olukai Ho'opio Sandals - Women's
description: See you on the flipside. Versatile and easy to wear, these summer staples have water-resistant straps and a fast drying lining.Synthetic upper and footbed.Water-resistant synthetic strap with fast-drying jersey lining.Soft nylon toe post.Anatomically moulded micro-textured PU midsole, designed for water.Non marking rubber with textured pods for extra traction and durability.
